mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.power_id as powerId, t.power_name as power_name, t.name , t.deal_time as dealTime, t.deal_address as dealAddress, t.deal_url as dealUrl, t.link_phone as linkPhone, t.deal_limit_days as dealLimitDays, t.flow_pic as flowPic, t.setting_basis as settingBasis, t.deal_conditions as dealConditions, t.fee_standard as feeStandard, t.record_status as recordStatus, t.creator_account as creatorAccount, t.created_time as createdTime, t.modifier_account as modifierAccount, t.modified_time as modifiedTime FROM tb_sp_power_busi t where id = #{id} and record_status != 0
